name: Unearth Treasure
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Over the course of eight hours, you gradually dredge up precious gems and metals in the area, pulling them from deep within the ground or mountains until they are just beneath the surface. The newfound valuables are centered in 2d6+4 locations within the area, at least one of which is located within 1 mile of your position. Each such trove covers an area with a radius of roughly 40 feet and a depth of roughly 5 feet.

This spell can only affect a given area once every decade.
